title: Is CIE lvl 1 compulsory...??
content: We got our time table today  and every Tuesday we hav CIE lvl 1.. For EC campus...! And there is Special topic on Saturdays...

comments.body: I heard cie was compulsory, but you mentioned special topics, do we need to come to college for the special topics...
In our 3rd sem special topics were online but in 4th sem they went to offline mode and used to be held after Friday lunch breaks
I am in 5th sem, I know that, in the time table it is written that way on Saturday
Oh, some people in my class were saying that cie is only for 2nd years and idts we will get to do special topics this sem as we are already doing 24 credits
Yeah the cie thing is kinda unclear, it might happen as the last time
